name: @siegrift/tsfunct
author: Siegrift <e.tesarr@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn tsc --target "ES5" --outDir "dist" --declaration true && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist

hooks.pre-commit: yarn typedoc --out docs ./src --mode file  --exclude 'src/test/*' && cp -r ./assets/* docs/assets && git add docs/*

description: Tsfunct is a **T**ype**S**cript **funct**ional library made directly for TS with its static typesystem in mind.
